翨翨翨

翨字的基本解释

翨
chì
猛禽。
古同“翅”，鸟的翅膀。

翨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chì］
［《廣韻》施智切，去寘，書。］
［《廣韻》居企切，去寘，見。］
同“翅1”。

翨字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【羽字部】　翨； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页958第18
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?施智切，音翅。【說文】鳥之彊羽。【周禮·秋官·翨氏註】翨，鳥?也。　又【玉篇】猛也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?居企切，音馶。翨或作翅。

翨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
翨字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
chì
Raptor.
Ancient with "wings", bird wings.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chì］
["Guangyun" Shi Zhiqie, go to set, book. ]
["Guangyun" is home to the enterprise, go to the home, see you. ]
Same as "wing 1".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [The Department of Yu Zi] 　翨; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: Page 958, 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Shi Zhiqie, sound wings. [Said the text] The bird's strong feather. 【Zhou Li·Qiuguan·Yinshi Note】Yun, the bird?　[Jade articles] Meng Ye.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Home-enterprise cut, sound. Ying or winged.
